snippet: As the new world number one, Andy Murray could be troubled by the weight of expectations on his shoulders at the ATP World Tour Finals, but the Briton just wants to enjoy his new status....
lead_paragraph: As the new world number one, Andy Murray could be troubled by the weight of expectations on his shoulders at the ATP World Tour Finals, but the Briton just wants to enjoy his new status.

headline.print_headline: Murray Just Wants to Enjoy Number One Status for Now
headline.main: Murray Just Wants to Enjoy Number One Status for Now
